participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Sarah enjoys connecting with others and cherishes her time spent with family.
participant_1.background: I have a wide variety of music to keep me company while I'm working on maintaining my healthy weight. I am a mother. I like to drink chai tea before bed every night. I have a brother but we don’t talk much yet. I enjoy shopping and spending time with my dog, but I like to sleep in.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Playful and light-hearted, Mark enjoys humor and is open about his challenges while still finding joy in activities.
participant_2.background: I'd like to go for a run, but my beer belly is getting in the way. I am 5'3 and love movie time. I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake. My favorite food to harvest is carrots. I go for a walk in the park to clear my head and to enjoy the sunshine.

content.text: Hello!  What kind of music do you like?
I like to listen to country music while I'm working out.
I love country music! What's your favorite song?
My favorite song is "I'm Not Gonna Miss You" by Glen Campbell.
That's a good song! I love the line "I'm not gonna miss you, and I'm not gonna cry."
I know! It's so sad but so beautiful.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go swimming in the lake.
That sounds like fun! I love swimming too.
I also like to go for walks in the park.
I love going for walks in the park too! It's so relaxing.
Me too! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I agree! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
You too! I'm looking forward to talking to you more.
Me too! I hope we can get to know each other better.
